overview: Here it is folks, Don Cherry's Lucky 13. Blue's so excited about this DVD, she bites me right on the neck. And why shouldn't she be excited, we have the best NHL action of any DVD around. We have the best hits, saves, goals, bloopers and more. I also give some advice to parents and coaches for young hockey players. Blue thinks this is the best DVD yet! You're gonna love it. P.S. I'm not kidding about Blue biting me, it's on the DVD.
tagline: Highlights from the 2000-2001 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry.
title: Don Cherry: Lucky 13
